description: A prominent factory in Kachakonya, owned by a well-respected party member, has been found seriously polluting a local river. This has caused health issues among the local population. Environmental activists and health organizations are demanding immediate action against the factory.

options.description: They're just out to smear our name, ignore them!
That's it, no more dirty business - shut it down!
Impose a fine and demand the factory to implement proper waste processing. I hope our college will understand us...

title: Factory Polluting Local River
